actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution informing the Senate that a quorum of the House has assembled and has elected Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., a Representative from the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, Speaker; and Benjamin J. Guthrie, a citizen of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Clerk.

summary.text: Informs the Senate that a quorum of the House of Representatives has assembled, that Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., has been elected Speaker, and that Benjamin J. Guthrie has been elected Clerk of the House.

titles.title: A resolution informing the Senate that a quorum of the House has assembled and has elected Thomas P. O'Neill, Jr., a Representative from the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, Speaker; and Benjamin J. Guthrie, a citizen of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Clerk.
